gwt.g3d.client.gl2.array
Class WebGLArrayBuffer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      gwt.g3d.client.gl2.array.WebGLArrayBuffer
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class WebGLArrayBuffer
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

The WebGLArrayBuffer interface describes the buffer used to store data for the WebGLArray interface and its subclasses.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

Method Detail

createBuffer

public static WebGLArrayBuffer createBuffer(int length)
Deprecated. 
Create a new WebGLArrayBuffer of the passed length in bytes. Data in the buffer is initialized to 0.

Parameters:
length -

getByteLength

public final int getByteLength()
Deprecated. 
Gets the length of the buffer in bytes. The length is fixed when the WebGLArrayBuffer is created.
